title: Who works for product management at Riot? This is unacceptable...
body:
Championship Thresh Figure was supposedly restocked at 3 am AEDT. I went to school and got $60 ready to buy Championship Thresh but when I got home at 3 pm AEDT, they had sold out. 

**How the did you sell out in less than 12 hours?** Did you stock 5 figures or some shit?

It was super clear this was a high demand item because it already sold out at least once. Your  page views can tell you how popular a particular item is as well. There was no excuse this time, especially for a 12 hour sell out.

replies.body: Concerts with well over 80,000 seats available sell out in minutes.. You really thought something with such high demand as you put it would last??
but now you have 60 dollars to spend on real life :)
